szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.GameManager

  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class managing the game level and used for storing player scores to display after the game finishes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameManager(GameConfig config) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameLevelPrivileged getCurrentGameLevel()
      Gets the current game level.
      GameLevelPrivileged getNextGameLevel()
      Stores away the scores for the previous level and switches to the next level, which it returns.
      GameResults getResults()
      Gets the result of all players in this game.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public GameManager(GameConfig config)
            throws ConfigProcessingException
        Throws:

    • Method Detail

      • getNextGameLevel

        public GameLevelPrivileged getNextGameLevel()
                                     throws GameLevelInitializationException
        Stores away the scores for the previous level and switches to the next level, which it returns. If the previous level was the final one, returns null.
        Returns:
        the next game level | null if this was the final level
        Throws:
        GameLevelInitializationException - if the initialization of the next level has failed for some reason

      • getCurrentGameLevel

        public GameLevelPrivileged getCurrentGameLevel()
        Gets the current game level.
        Returns:
        the current game level

      • getResults

        public GameResults getResults()
        Gets the result of all players in this game.
        Returns:
        the result of all players in this game
